item.description:
The SoulMate band is bringing a dance party to Newburyport to celebrate the 3rd Anniversary of downtown dining destination, Mission Oak Grill. The show style band specializing in Classic Soul, Motown & R&B along with additional Jazz, Funk, Classic 60's Rock and Disco favorites. Every Single Song in their tight and tested repertoire is a hit with fans of all ages! SoulMate has succeeded in crafting an experience that is exciting, fun and interactive with their audience. If you are seeking a high energy night out, look no further, SoulMate delivers.

SoulMate band takes the stage on Saturday, October 9th at 9 PM. Doors will open at 8 pm. There will be a cash bar available. Mission Oak Grill is located at 26 Green Street in Newburyport, MA. Tickets are general admission and cost $10. They can be purchased online today at www.drinkwaterproductions.com.
item.name: Motown Dance Party with SoulMate Band
